text: Hontoni ware wa, nufu ya kare-igo no yogen-sha-tachi ni keiji shita yo ni, anata ni keiji shita. Ware wa mata iburahimu, isumairu, isuhaku, yaakobu oyobi sho shizoku ni (keiji shi), mata i â€• sa, isuhaku, yunusu, harun narabini suraiman ni mo (keiji shita). Mata ware wa daudo ni shihen o sazuketa
